article: Most children like to watch TV. It's very interesting. By watching TV they can _ a lot, learn a lot and know many _ about their countries and the world. Of course they can also learn _ the radio. But they can learn better and more easily _ TV. Because they can hear and watch at the same time. But they can't see _ over the radio. TV helps to open children's eyes. TV helps to open their minds ,too. They learn newer and better ways of doing things. Many children watch TV _ Saturday and Sunday. But some students watch TV every night. They usually go to bed very late. They can't have a good rest.
